verbose_text: In our study, we found that A/R induced NF-kappaB nuclear translocation in an IkappaBalpha dependent manner, enhanced cardiomyocyte apoptosis, increased caspase-3 activation and the production of proinflammatory cytokines (TNF-alpha, IL-1beta) accompanied with the upregulation of TLR4 expression, implying that TLR4 may play an important role in triggering apoptosis and the inflammatory response in the process of myocardial A/R.
